definition: directly on target, a conspicuous success, to strike violently
details:
adverb
- directly on target
= example: directly on target
= synonyms: man-to-man
noun
- a conspicuous success
= synonyms: hit
- a border of hair that is cut short and hangs across the forehead
= synonyms: fringe
- a sudden very loud noise
= synonyms: blast
- a vigorous blow
= synonyms: knock
- the swift release of a store of affective force
= example: the swift release of a store of affective force
= synonyms: kick
verb
- to strike violently
= example: to strike violently
= synonyms: slam
- to close violently
= example: to close violently
= synonyms: slam
- to have sexual intercourse with
= example: to have sexual intercourse with
= synonyms: fuck
- to move noisily
= example: to move noisily
= synonyms: flap
- to produce a sharp often metallic explosive or percussive sound
= example: to produce a sharp often metallic explosive or percussive sound
